comment: I took Study in Humanities at Georgia Highlands with her, I LOVED her. She was so nice and extremely flexible with our life. As long as you do the work she says she very understanding. I would SO take her class again she was such a joy. If you need an easy A to boost up your GPA this is the class to take

Professor Swanson was nice as a person but as a professor she was pretty useless. She was very vague and never really clear about what she wanted. I would never take her again and i wouldnt recommend her to anyone to take.
Good teacher, nice, not too hard (not  super easy either).

VERY NICE :) grades easily. use the writing center for second opinions. VERY good about answering your questions. makes class INTERESTING with little activities. really wants you to succeed and tries to get to know everyone. take her! i got an A! just make sure you know what she expects on assignments (only a few) and youll be fine!

Ms.Swanson is a fantastic teacher! Whether you are good in english or not you should take her class. I enjoyed her teaching very much and felt that she was a fairly easy grader, plus she understands the life of a college student so she doesn't bog her students down with many assignments!

WOOOONDERFUL professor!!!!! Smart, sweet, interesting prof, her class was great. We had not too many assignments but enough to keep us moving forward. I learned a lot and came out with a good grade in the end. Good class.
This was a good class, Mrs. Swanson is pretty nice. Only a few papers, not too much work.
Very nice, very helpful. Good teacher.
Professor Swanson is a wonderful professor!! She is so nice but also on top of things. She relates to us but also teaches what we need to know. Loved her, loved her class :-)

Ms.Swanson is really sweet, fun, and enjoys what she does. I can actually say that I enjoyed going to her class because she was so chill about everything but got the job done. She is down to earth and understands how and what students think and she always keeps that in mind. She is great.

She is nice but the assignments are always vague and it is never really clear exactly what she expects. Also the grading appeared to be at absolute random as if she just read the paper once and picked a grade out of the air. And finally I didn't like that everything was focused on campus issues as it alienated commuter students such as myself.

It is apparent that Ms. Swanson enjoys what she does. Whether it is a class activity or a letter to the editor, every assignment in this class was relevant and meaningful. The environment in the classroom was refreshingly stress free. I enjoyed her teaching style and I would recommend her to anyone!

Mrs. Swanson is the coolest teacher I have ever had. She is incredibly intelligent and has an amazing presence in the classroom. She is very lenient but there is no need to act out as everyone has some instant need to respect her. She is incredibly informative and is willing to help any student in need. I recommend her to any student ever. You rock

Instructor Swanson was very good and helpful. She encouraged students to do well.Go to class, need help use the lab.I would definitely take her again. Very patient. If english is not your strong point, take her Highly recommended
